sentence: Over  the  Thanksgiving  weekend,  three  students  of  Palestinian  descent  were  shot  in  Vermont  â€”  two  of  them  were  wearing  the  keffiyeh.
He  has  praised  the  Oct.  7  attack  that  the  Israeli  government  says  killed  1,200,  including  women  and  children,  as  a  victory  for  the  Palestinian  cause.

He  has  maintained  that  stance,  even  as  the  Israeli  response  has  killed  more  than  16,000  people  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Gaza  Health  Ministry,  which  includes  mostly  women  and  children.
